subject: Fwd: URGENT - Multiple shipments needed
body:
Hi team,

Forwarding this from our ops team. Need quotes for ALL of these today:

1) SFO -> Frankfurt 
   850kg / 5cbm
   (this one is super urgent, need fastest option)

2) Shanghai to LA
   2x40ft sea fright
   
3) Bombay to Chicago  
   400 kgs air
   Dimensons: 2x1x1.5m per pallet, 4 pallets

Note: #2 might actually be Shenzhen not Shanghai, client is confirming. Quote both pls.

Also our finance team says we should have a 10% discount on file - can you check?

Need response by EOD!!

Mike

PS - for #1 what if we did sea instead, just to compare?
